statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -5 \\ 1 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 8 \\ 4 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
